purpose: The email is a call for Letters of Interest (LoI) to organize the European conference on Software Architecture (ECSA) for the years 2027 and onwards. It highlights the significance of ECSA as a premier conference in the field, inviting teams to express their intent to organize the event. The email outlines the requirements for the LoI, including details about the proposed General Chair, location, and supporting organizations. It also specifies the submission deadline and procedure for interested parties.
